title: Customized Instructional Design for Enhancing DNP Scholarly Writing Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic nursing theory and research methodologies
context.additional_context: Need to establish an asynchronous feedback system in smartphone-based learning environments.

learning_goals: Students can understand the structure of academic papers (introduction-methods-results-discussion) and write outlines tailored to their topics.
Through peer review, students can revise draft papers three or more times and achieve an 80% or higher feedback implementation rate.
Students can reduce emotional barriers encountered during academic writing by 50% by applying stress management techniques.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
